snippet.name: Embed Flash
snippet.help: Embed an SWF into a page
snippet.starttext: <object classid="clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000" codebase="http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,0,0" width="$${Width:320}" height="$${Height:240}" id="$${ID:flash1}"> <param name="movie" value="$${SWF Path}" /><param name="quality" value="$${Quality:high|low}" /><param name="bgcolor" value="$${Background:#FFFFFF}" /><embed src="$${SWF Path}" quality="$${Quality:high|low}" bgcolor="$${Background:#FFFFFF}" width="$${Width:320}" height="$${Height:240}" name="$${ID:flash1}" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" pluginspace="http://www.macromedia.com/go/getflashplayer"></embed></object>
